CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1959, pg. A20 reads: "Letsche Track Champions - Congratulations are due these Letsche Elementary School track champions. From left to right, first row:  Myron Little, Walter Cabbagestalk and James Strong.  Second row: Jerome Turner, James Colvin, Leroy Grant and Robert Taylor.  Third row: Harry Dowdy, Thomas Thrift and Walter Harris.  Fourth row: James Lindsay, Louis Morgan, Ernest Whitted and Cleveland Edwards.  Fifth row: Ellis Montague, Dwight Hill, Reams Colby, Louis Jones and R.T. Crystian.  Sixth row: Andrew Boyd, Leslie Cox, Sam Fleming and J. Donald Geyer, coach. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Letsche Elementary School track champions, from left, first row: Myron Little, Walter Cabbagestalk, and James Strong; second row: Jerome Turner, James Colvin, Leroy Grant, and Robert Taylor; third row: Harry Dowdy, Thomas Thrift, and Walter Harris; fourth row: James Lindsay, Louis Morgan, Ernest Whitted, and Cleveland Edwards; fifth row: Ellis Montague, Dwight Hill, Reams Colby, Louis Jones, and R.T. Crystian; sixth row: Andrew Boyd, Leslie Cox, Sam Fleming and Coach J. Donald Geyer, standing on steps below school
